advancements.the_winter_rescue.root.desc: The last autumn on Earth has passed since long. You need to rescue yourself, and hopefully, unveil the mystery that freezes Mankind...
info.jei.the_winter_rescue.disabled: This item is disabled in the modpack.
info.jei.the_winter_rescue.energy_core: The core of technology from all Space Mankind. Used to build the Generator, keep it safe!
info.jei.the_winter_rescue.clay_tool: Use a clay tool to right click it on a clay block to do pottery. You may need to click several times.
tooltip.the_winter_rescue.replaced_recip: Related recipes can be replaced through other means
tooltip.the_winter_rescue.snowy_vine: Obtained via cutting leaves with a flint knife
tooltip.the_winter_rescue.flint_knife: Get snowy vines when used to cut leaves
tooltip.the_winter_rescue.flint_knife_2: Right click the flint workbench to craft
tooltip.the_winter_rescue.tanning_rack: After placing the item to be tanned, right click it with flint process knife to proceed
tooltip.the_winter_rescue.clay_tool: Use clay tool to right click it on a clay block to do pottery
tooltip.the_winter_rescue.activated_carb: Obtained via using a charcoal on a steam charger
tooltip.the_winter_rescue.campfire: Press Q to throw fuel on it and light it via an ignition tool!
tooltip.the_winter_rescue.lining: Shapeless crafting it with any equipment to give it warming effect!
